name: BitDuo
description:
Ever wonder how a 2D game looks inside the computer?

In BitDuo, two players work together to play a classic 8-bit platformer. 
One player plays on PC and controls the character, while the VR player helps them out by manipulating the level from 'inside the game'.

BitDuo was made during the 2017 NYC VR Game Jam. It works with both Oculus Rift and HTC Vive. 

Team
Tina Cheng
Ji Dong
Sam Levine
Angel Say
Thomas Van Bouwel
